description: Your stuffed friend will be ready to defend the playroom in this adorable karate outfit with belt! Your plush pal will be ready for action in this classically styled karate uniform with black belt. This outfit features a white uniform with black belt that will make your plush animal ready to go! Your new martial arts outfit will fit most 8"-10" Stuffed Animals. This outfit makes a great companion to a stuffed animal clothes wardrobe with its classic martial arts styling. Did you know Karate is actually a combination of two words: kara (empty) and te (hand). The definition of karate, therefore, is self defense fighting with no weapons.
